title: getting massive amounts of "Unknown error has occured" in client
body:
November 10th 2016
Between 6pm and 8pm EST
Happens in both Ranked Flex Queue / Normal Draft / Even occurs just trying to navigate the store and or menu systems to alter masteries and Runes.

Unknown Error
An unknown error has occurred

Sorry about that. We've sent a report to the server.

If you continue encountering this error you may want to check the support site or forum for more information.

Kappa123

Want to play some games, but can't due to this error. 

Screenshot. 8:22pm EST

http://imgur.com/uMeG2Mw

Halp RITO PLS <3

replies.body:
This error typically pops up if your connection to our servers is unstable. I'd recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address the most common local network settings that conflict with League.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
